body:
To clear up some information here, the author and artist of this is the same as the artist of sweet guy (meaning the author of sweet guy is not working on this so don't expect the same level of story). The artist has never really written any stories and so far it's def not gonna be anything outstanding.

Also, the artist unluckily has never really got out of their health issues and right now the series is on hold (due to the health of the artist) until june 10th(iirc)

This is so shit. What is the damn habit of putting MCs not only sub-betas but also mentally retarded!!! I'm not saying they have to necessarily put an alpha male, but seriously, the Sweet Guy's MC was more credible than this idiot, who is not less than 10 years mental old, I ditch this shit.
Looking forward to this, been a fan since sweet guy.
I read sweet guy and is really good, not underwhelm or overwhelm. But this?...... I don't really know.
This just reeks of the usual h webtoon bs of ntr scares for 50 fucking chapters, but at least it already showed one girl as "ruined" instead of drawing her out for like thirty chapters
Also, author/artist is currently on hiatus (and will be plenty of times since this guy has a record of going on hiatus frequently due to a delicate health condition).

This pornhwa has some great art and a pretty unique style. Story is going good so far but don't get your hopes up way too much, Korean sauce (Korean fuckery: NTR, cheating, blackmail, etc) isn't out of the question as the story progresses later.
i might have discovered a treasure here
